item.title: Renovation Soul
item.description:
Renovation Soul

Welcome to Renovation Soul! Here you'll find bite sized portions of wisdom to renovate your soul.

item.title: No title
item.description: Renovation Soul blog dedicated to sharing the messages that Gina and Jeane receive while working together with angels. If you’re reading this, then these angelic messages are meant for you as well- we hope they provide earthly wisdom, and bring hope and comfort into your life.

item.title: Services
item.description:
Services

Reconnective Healing: an energy therapy that facilitates healing by bringing light and information to the body through the frequencies surrounding it. You may experience tingling, hot and cold chills, and other sensations during the treatment. This is a very gentle form of energy healing, and your body will begin to integrate the energy shifts immediately.
